welcomeMessage: Hi **@chauler**, how can I help you?

response.value:
Snippet with error: ```html
``` Location of error: Inside the second form in the section tag. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships Detection Algorithm: Check if every form control has a corresponding label. Explanation of Error: The radio buttons with id "1" and "2" do not have corresponding labels. This makes it difficult for screen reader users to understand the purpose of these form controls. --- Snippet with error: ```html
``` Location of error: Inside the second form in the section tag. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships Detection Algorithm: Check if every form control has a corresponding label. Explanation of Error: The checkboxes with id "vehicle1" and "vehicle2" do not have corresponding labels. This makes it difficult for screen reader users to understand the purpose of these form controls. --- Snippet with error: ```html Home Cars About Us Contact ``` Location of error: Inside the nav tag. WCAG Guideline violated: 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context) Detection Algorithm: Check if all links have a href attribute that is not a "#". Explanation of Error: The links in the navigation bar do not lead anywhere as they all have a href attribute of "#". This can be confusing for users as they do not know the purpose of the link. --- Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: Inside the first form in the section tag. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.4.3 Contrast (Minimum) Detection Algorithm: Check if the contrast ratio between the text and the background is at least 4.5:1 for normal text. Explanation of Error: The contrast ratio between the white text and the green background may not meet the minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1 for normal text. This can make it difficult for users with low vision to read the text.

followups.message: What are the best practices for providing accessible labels for form controls in HTML?

b.description: Ask Copilot or type / for commands

metadata.helpTextPrefix: You can ask me general programming questions, or chat with the following participants which have specialized expertise and can perform actions:
metadata.helpTextVariablesPrefix: You can also help me understand your question by using the following variables to give me extra context:

helpTextPostfix.value:
To have a great conversation, ask me questions as if I was a real programmer:

* **Show me the code** you want to talk about by having the files open and selecting the most important lines.
* **Make refinements** by asking me follow-up questions, adding clarifications, providing errors, etc.
* **Review my suggested code** and tell me about issues or improvements, so I can iterate on it.

You can also ask me questions about your editor selection by [starting an inline chat session](command:inlineChat.start).

Learn more about [GitHub Copilot](https://docs.github.com/copilot/using-github-copilot/getting-started-with-github-copilot?tool=vscode&utm_source=editor&utm_medium=chat-panel&utm_campaign=2024q3-em-MSFT-getstarted) in [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/overview).

b.name: GitHub Copilot

parts.text: Are there any more issues? List all that you find.

message.text: Are there any more issues? List all that you find.

response.value:
Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: Inside the first form in the section tag. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships Detection Algorithm: Check if every form control has a corresponding label. Explanation of Error: The select element with id "carType" has a corresponding label, but the label is empty. This makes it difficult for screen reader users to understand the purpose of this form control. --- Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: Inside the section tag. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.2.2 Captions (Prerecorded) Detection Algorithm: Check if all video elements have captions. Explanation of Error: The video does not have captions. This makes it difficult for deaf or hard of hearing users to understand the content of the video. --- Snippet with error: ```html

Description of Car 1.

Description of Car 2.

``` Location of error: Inside the section tag. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.1.1 Non-text Content Detection Algorithm: Check if all images have alt attributes that provide a meaningful description. Explanation of Error: The images have alt attributes, but the descriptions "Car 1" and "Car 2" are not meaningful. They do not provide enough information for users who cannot see the images. --- Snippet with error: ```html

Car Rental Service

...

Welcome to our Car Rental Service

...

Our Services

...

Featured Cars

...

Watch Our Video

...

Form:

...

End of form

``` Location of error: Throughout the body of the document. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships Detection Algorithm: Check if heading elements follow a logical order. Explanation of Error: The heading levels should follow a logical order, starting with h1 for the main title, then h2 for major sections, and h3 for subsections. The use of h4 for "Form:" and then returning to h3 for "End of form" breaks this logical order.

followups.message: What are some best practices for improving the accessibility of HTML forms?

response.value:
Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: At the start of the document. WCAG Guideline violated: 3.1.1 Language of Page Detection Algorithm: Check if the lang attribute in the html tag correctly represents the language of the page. Explanation of Error: The lang attribute is set to "en" (English). If the content of the page is not in English, this would be misleading for screen readers and other assistive technologies. --- Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: Inside the head tag. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.4.4 Resize text Detection Algorithm: Check if the viewport meta tag allows for zooming. Explanation of Error: The viewport meta tag is set to disable zooming by setting the maximum-scale to 1.0. This can make it difficult for users with low vision to read the content. --- Snippet with error: ```html
Home About Contact

Welcome to our website

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

Copyright © 2022

``` Location of error: Throughout the body of the document. WCAG Guideline violated: 2.4.1 Bypass Blocks Detection Algorithm: Check if there are mechanisms to bypass blocks of content that are repeated on multiple web pages. Explanation of Error: There is no way to bypass the navigation links that are repeated on every page. This can be frustrating for keyboard and screen reader users who have to go through these links to get to the main content. --- Snippet with error: ```html
Home About Contact

Welcome to our website

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

Copyright © 2022

``` Location of error: Throughout the body of the document. WCAG Guideline violated: 2.4.6 Headings and Labels Detection Algorithm: Check if headings and labels describe topic or purpose. Explanation of Error: The heading "Welcome to our website" does not provide information about the content of the section. This can make it difficult for users to navigate the page.

followups.message: What are the guidelines for providing captions for videos to ensure accessibility?
